verses.verse: <S%H310>After<s%> these <S%H1697>things<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to <S%H87>Abram<s%> in a <S%H4236>vision,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3372>"Don't<s%> be afraid, <S%H87>Abram.<s%> I am your <S%H4043>shield,<s%> your <S%H3966>exceedingly<s%> <S%H7235>great<s%> <S%H7939>reward.<s%>"

<S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H136>"Lord<s%> <S%H136>Yahweh,<s%> what will you <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H1980>me,<s%> since I go <S%H6185>childless,<s%> and <S%H1121>he<s%> who will inherit my <S%H1004>estate<s%> <S%H1931>is<s%> <S%H461>Eliezer<s%> of <S%H1834>Damascus?<s%>"
<S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H5414>"Behold,<s%> to me you have given <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2233>seed:<s%> <S%H1121>and,<s%> behold, one born in my <S%H1004>house<s%> is my <S%H3423>heir.<s%>"

<S%H1697>Behold,<s%> the word of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came to <S%H559>him,<s%> saying, "This man will not be your <S%H3423>heir,<s%> but he who will come <S%H3318>out<s%> of your own <S%H4578>body<s%> will be your <S%H3423>heir.<s%>"

Yahweh brought him <S%H3318>outside,<s%> <S%H2351>and<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H5027>"Look<s%> now toward the <S%H8064>sky,<s%> and <S%H5608>count<s%> the <S%H3556>stars,<s%> if you are <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H5608>count<s%> <S%H559>them.<s%>" He said to <S%H3541>Abram,<s%> "So shall your seed <S%H2233>be.<s%>"
He <S%H539>believed<s%> in <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> and he <S%H2803>reckoned<s%> it to him for <S%H6666>righteousness.<s%>

He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3068>him,<s%> "I am Yahweh who brought you <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H218>Ur<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldees,<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> you this <S%H776>land<s%> to inherit <S%H3423>it.<s%>"
He <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H136>"Lord<s%> <S%H136>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H4100>how<s%> will I <S%H3045>know<s%> that I will inherit <S%H3423>it?<s%>"

He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3947>him,<s%> "Bring me a <S%H5697>heifer<s%> three years <S%H8027>old,<s%> a female <S%H5795>goat<s%> three years <S%H8027>old,<s%> a <S%H352>ram<s%> three years <S%H8027>old,<s%> a <S%H8449>turtledove,<s%> and a young <S%H1469>pigeon.<s%>"

He <S%H3947>brought<s%> him all of <S%H1334>these,<s%> and divided them in the <S%H8432>middle,<s%> and <S%H5414>laid<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H1335>half<s%> <S%H7125>opposite<s%> the <S%H7453>other;<s%> but he <S%H1334>didn't<s%> divide the <S%H6833>birds.<s%>
The <S%H5861>birds<s%> of prey came <S%H3381>down<s%> on the <S%H6297>carcasses,<s%> and <S%H87>Abram<s%> drove them <S%H5380>away.<s%>

When the <S%H8121>sun<s%> was going <S%H935>down,<s%> a deep <S%H8639>sleep<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> on <S%H87>Abram.<s%> Now <S%H367>terror<s%> and <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2825>darkness<s%> fell on <S%H5307>him.<s%>

He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H87>Abram,<s%> <S%H3045>"Know<s%> for <S%H3045>sure<s%> that your <S%H2233>seed<s%> will live as <S%H1616>foreigners<s%> in a <S%H776>land<s%> that is not <S%H5647>theirs,<s%> and will serve <S%H6031>them.<s%> They will afflict them <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>
I will also <S%H1777>judge<s%> that <S%H1471>nation,<s%> whom they will <S%H5647>serve.<s%> <S%H310>Afterward<s%> they will come <S%H3318>out<s%> with <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7399>wealth,<s%>
but you will <S%H935>go<s%> to your <S%H1>fathers<s%> in <S%H7965>peace.<s%> You will be <S%H6912>buried<s%> in a <S%H2896>good<s%> old <S%H7872>age.<s%>

In the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> <S%H1755>generation<s%> they will come <S%H2008>here<s%> <S%H7725>again,<s%> for the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorite<s%> is not <S%H2008>yet<s%> <S%H8003>full.<s%>"

It came to pass <S%H8121>that,<s%> when the sun went <S%H935>down,<s%> and it was <S%H5939>dark,<s%> <S%H6227>behold,<s%> a smoking <S%H8574>furnace,<s%> and a <S%H784>flaming<s%> <S%H3940>torch<s%> <S%H5674>passed<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> these <S%H1506>pieces.<s%>

In <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with <S%H87>Abram,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "To your <S%H2233>seed<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> this <S%H776>land,<s%> from the <S%H5104>river<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> to the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5104>river,<s%> the <S%H5104>river<s%> <S%H6578>Euphrates:<s%>
the <S%H7017>Kenites,<s%> the <S%H7074>Kenizzites,<s%> the <S%H6935>Kadmonites,<s%>
the <S%H2850>Hittites,<s%> the <S%H6522>Perizzites,<s%> the <S%H7497>Rephaim,<s%>
the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanites,<s%> the <S%H1622>Girgashites,<s%> and the <S%H2983>Jebusites.<s%>"
